TopicTitle: How could I find a magic asteroid?

Articles.Content:
I have visited 26 asteroids near Kerbin. None of them are magic asteroid. And most of them look similar. Where could I find a magic one?

Thanks for the suggestion!

Edited March 18, 2023 by Aeolica
More searching I guess, you're probably close to get one (I got 1 in 30 when I tried)
It’s random when the asteroid first appears within physics range, I think you can just save before it enters physics range and then keep reloading until it produces a magic one?
I believe you could also "cheat" by editing your save file to turn a regular asteroid into a magic one. But I've never done that before.
